example_sentence_italian: Aeroporti in Italia offrono molti servizi.
example_sentence_english: Airports in Italy offer many services.

example_sentence_italian: Ho visitato degli aeroporti in Europa.
example_sentence_english: I visited some airports in Europe.
I'm going to the airport tomorrow.

example_sentence_italian: I voli sono diretti agli aeroporti internazionali.
example_sentence_english: The flights are headed to the international airports.

example_sentence_italian: Esco dall'aeroporto e prendo un taxi.
example_sentence_english: I leave the airport and take a taxi.

example_sentence_italian: I passeggeri arrivano dagli aeroporti vicini.
example_sentence_english: Passengers arrive from the nearby airports.

example_sentence_italian: Nell'aeroporto c'è un bar aperto 24 ore.
example_sentence_english: There's a 24-hour bar in the airport.

example_sentence_italian: Negli aeroporti sono in vigore controlli severi.
example_sentence_english: There are strict checks in the airports.

example_sentence_italian: Sull'aeroporto si svolge una conferenza oggi.
example_sentence_english: A conference is taking place at the airport today.

example_sentence_italian: Si trovano informazioni sugli aeroporti online.
example_sentence_english: You can find information about the airports online.

example_sentence_italian: Con l'aeroporto chiuso, molti voli sono stati cancellati.
example_sentence_english: With the airport closed, many flights were canceled.

example_sentence_italian: Ci coordiniamo con gli aeroporti internazionali.
example_sentence_english: We coordinate with the international airports.

notes: contraction of con + il; not used before vowel, nonstandard
contraction of con + i; uncommon before vowel
